issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: FS Shell is File System based, but it is using the FileContext API. Currently, hadoop fs -text hdfs://... ' will work, but hadoop fs -text webhdfs://...' will not work, because we are using the FileContext API in the webhdfs case.
fields.summary: FS Shell should use File system API, not FileContext
